hotelBooking.title: Hotel Booking

roundTripTickets.details: Optimized fares with smart layovers and free rebooking assistance.

oneWayTickets.details: Best-value one-way routes, baggage advisory, and visa guidance.

medicalSlip.details: Help with airline medical forms and travel-ready documentation.

businessVisa.title: Business Visa
businessVisa.details: Priority handling, invitation letters, and multi-entry options.

support24_7.title: 24/7 Support
support24_7.details: Round-the-clock help via phone, WhatsApp, and Telegram.

destinations.subtitle: Discover the most sought-after destinations that travelers are choosing for their next adventure

airlines.title: Partner Airlines
airlines.subtitle: Fly with the world's most trusted airlines, offering premium services and unmatched reliability

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied travelers who trust SkyEthio for their travel needs. Experience the difference of premium service.

hero.title: About SkyEthio Travels & Cargo
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in connecting Ethiopia to the world through premium travel and cargo services

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded with a vision to bridge Ethiopia with the global community, SkyEthio Travels & Cargo has been at the forefront of providing exceptional travel and logistics services. We understand that every journey is unique, and every cargo shipment carries dreams and aspirations.
story.paragraph2: Our commitment to excellence, reliability, and customer satisfaction has made us a trusted name in the industry. From individual travelers to large corporations, we serve with the same dedication and attention to detail.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for perfection in every service we provide, ensuring the highest standards of quality.

customerFirst.title: Customer First
customerFirst.description: Our customers are at the heart of everything we do. Their satisfaction is our primary goal.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We build trust through consistent, dependable service that our clients can count on.

globalReach.title: Global Reach
globalReach.description: Connecting Ethiopia to the world with comprehensive travel and cargo solutions.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To provide world-class travel and cargo services that connect Ethiopia to global destinations, ensuring safe, reliable, and efficient solutions for all our clients.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To lead Ethiopia's travel and cargo industry through innovation, reliability, and unforgettable customer experiences.

team.title: Our Dedicated Team
team.subtitle: Behind every successful journey is our team of experienced professionals who work tirelessly to ensure your travel and cargo needs are met with precision and care.

motto.title: Our Motto
motto.description: This simple yet powerful principle guides every decision we make and every service we provide. Trust is the foundation of all great relationships, and we're honored to earn yours.
